pull.title: Avoid slow transaction search with txindex enabled
pull.body: This is an alternative to #11507 where a slow search is not attempted (in any case) if `txindex` is enabled.

events.body:
~~Is this preferable to #11507 which is an elegant one-line change?~~

Edit: Now this is a one-line change too

events.message: Avoid slow transaction search with txindex enabled

comments.body: Mind to add a tiny comment to explain why fAllowSlow can be ignored?
